column1: Little Goat Diner////I went to Little Goat Diner in March of 2021 for dinner. The great thing about this place is that it has breakfast
column4: all day long Â we ordered the Bull's Eye French Toast
column5: which was just okay. It was a little soggy and didn't care for the egg that comes on top. We also ordered the Los Drowned
column6: which was so so delicious. The toppings and bolillo bread really take the beef to the next level. It's accompanied by what seems to be a broth
column7: to help make the bread more chewable. And it's also fire. Highly recommend the Los Drowned.
